amendatorysection.catchline: Competitive bids; rejection by materiel division; grounds; new bids.
amendatorysection.para: Any or all bids may be rejected by the materiel division. The materiel division may reject the bid of any bidder who has failed to perform a previous contract with the state. In any case where competitive bids are required and all bids are rejected, and the proposed purchase is not abandoned, new bids shall be solicited.
